entities.name: PartyLocation
entities.description: A geographic location associated with a party

attributes.name: party_location_id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for this party location

attributes.name: party_id
attributes.description: Foreign key to the Party entity

attributes.name: location_type
attributes.description: Type of location (e.g., Registered, Business, Residential)

attributes.name: address_line_1
attributes.description: First line of the address

attributes.name: address_line_2
attributes.description: Second line of the address

attributes.name: address_line_3
attributes.description: Third line of the address

attributes.name: city
attributes.description: City of the address

attributes.name: state_province
attributes.description: State or province of the address

attributes.name: postal_code
attributes.description: Postal or ZIP code of the address

attributes.name: country
attributes.description: Country of the address

attributes.name: is_primary
attributes.description: Flag indicating if this is the primary location

attributes.name: is_valid
attributes.description: Flag indicating if this address has been validated

attributes.name: validation_date
attributes.description: Date when this address was validated

attributes.name: validation_method
attributes.description: Method used to validate this address

attributes.name: latitude
attributes.description: Latitude coordinate of the address

attributes.name: longitude
attributes.description: Longitude coordinate of the address

attributes.name: effective_from
attributes.description: Date from which this address is effective

attributes.name: effective_to
attributes.description: Date until which this address is effective

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was created

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was last updated

attributes.name: deleted_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was marked as deleted

entities.name: ContactPoint
entities.description: A means of contacting a party

attributes.name: contact_point_id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for this contact point

attributes.name: party_id
attributes.description: Foreign key to the Party entity

attributes.name: contact_type
attributes.description: Type of contact (e.g., Email, Phone, PostalAddress, SocialNetwork)

attributes.name: contact_value
attributes.description: Value of the contact point (e.g., email address, phone number)

attributes.name: is_primary
attributes.description: Flag indicating if this is the primary contact point of its type

attributes.name: is_valid
attributes.description: Flag indicating if this contact point has been validated

attributes.name: validation_date
attributes.description: Date when this contact point was validated

attributes.name: validation_method
attributes.description: Method used to validate this contact point

attributes.name: purpose
attributes.description: Purpose of this contact point (e.g., Business, Personal, Billing)

attributes.name: effective_from
attributes.description: Date from which this contact point is effective

attributes.name: effective_to
attributes.description: Date until which this contact point is effective

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was created

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was last updated

attributes.name: deleted_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was marked as deleted
